title: Loving Hut - Brooklyn
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Chinese, Take-out, Asian, Vietnamese
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Each location is individual family owned and operated; this one opened in summer 2013. Serves all vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and vegan dessert.
